metadata.name: Finito #1
metadata.description:
Georgie, the dancer, had just finished the final set of poses and jumps for me. 'We've been going for ten hours,' I noted incredulously, looking at my watch. Georgie sank into a chair on the set to remove her ballet shoes. As I was about to dismantle my camera, something made me look across. 

"Stop," I said, "don't move." I took the shot. "Okay, now we're done."

"Finito?" she asked.

"Absolutely," I replied. "Finito."
